data.name: Unlock
data.detailed_description:
Into Unlock player have to guess a secret code consisting of a series of 4 unique numbers. Each guest results in feedback narrowing down the code's possibilities. The winner is the player who solves his opponent's secret code. You can play locally or Online up to 4 players (Human or IA).



3 Game Mode :

  • Unlock Classic :
Each player have to setup a code and then found those from other players

  • Unlock Quest :
In this game mode all players have to guess a random code (up to five), the first who found the quest code win the game

  • Training Mode :
Chill and perform your method, there will be you and one code only to find, no pressure

Online

You will be able to play online against your friends or strangers up to 4!

Local Play

You will be able to play localy against your friends or strangers (humm...) up to 4!

data.short_description: Into Unlock player have to guess a secret code consisting of a series of 4 unique numbers. Each guest results in feedback narrowing down the code's possibilities. The winner is the player who solves his opponent's secret code with fewer guesses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 315
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Sierra
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
